txt.en: Audvak can be found at Hultvís in Woodsedge.\n\nYou should speak to Audvak.
'Good luck, friend. Avabárg has become home to a dreadful gloom, and you should tread within its walls with caution.'

'It seems my worries were well-founded, [placeholder]! You found the spirit within Avabárg, and sent it away in defeat? May it stay gone, and the gloom with it!\n\n'Thank you for lending the Woodmen your aid.'
Audvak of the Woodmen is concerned about the gloom that has descended upon Avabárg.

'A gloom has come to Avabárg. Can you see it cast upon the middle of the Anduin, good [placeholder]? What omens it brings, I know not. What I can say is this: the Woodmen have not stepped foot upon Avabárg in quite some time, for only misfortune has followed when Avabárg is inhabited. The misfortunes of Avabárg are so gruesome, I can not speak of them further. This gloom, however is of a different misfortune. We Woodmen have never seen anything as such. I fear if we do nothing, we may bring upon ourselves the greatest misfortune the Woodmen have ever seen. I ask of you to investigate Avabárg for us, [placeholder].'
Audvak can be found at Hultvís in Woodsedge.\n\nYou should speak to Audvak.
